description: OpenBlock Labs standard schema for derivatives protocols (options and perps).

tables.label: Pools
tables.description: Pools in the protocol (one entry for each token).

creation_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block the pool was created on.

creation_block_number.description: The block number this pool was created on.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

pool_name.description: The name of the pool (ie, name() in the smart contract).

token_index.description: The index of the token in the smart contract (one row for each token in a pool).

token_address.description: The contract address of the token.

tables.label: LP Snapshot
tables.description: Liquidity providers snapshot (one entry for each token in a pool).

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, 2023-03-04 in YYYY-MM-DD format).

lp_address.description: The address of the liquidity provider.

token_index.description: The index of the token in the smart contract.

token_address.description: The address of the token provided as liquidity.

deposit_amount.description: (Optional, for Order Books) The amount deposited into the pool, decimal normalized.

deposit_amount_usd.description: (Optional, for Order Books) The amount deposited, in USD.

amount_useful.description: (Optional, for LPs) The amount of tokens supplied that are liquid and usable by users of the protocol, decimal normalized.

amount_useful_usd.description: (Optional, for LPs) The amount of liquid tokens supplied in USD.

liquidated_amount.description: The amount of tokens liquidated from the LP, decimal normalized.

total_fees_usd.description: (Optional) All fees generated by the LP in the given snapshot in USD.

user_fees_usd.description: (Optional) The portion of fees accrued to users of the protocol, in USD.

protocol_fees_usd.description: (Optional) The portion of fees accrued to the protocol, in USD.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, 2023-03-04 in YYYY-MM-DD format).

pool_address.description: The smart contract address of the pool.

token_index.description: The index of the token in the smart contract (one row for each token in a pool).

funding_rate.description: The funding rate in this pool at the time of the snapshot, as a percentage.

fee_rate.description: he pool's fee rate, as a percentage.

total_value_locked_usd.description: The total value locked in USD.

volume_usd.description: The volume of positions opened and closed in the given snapshot in USD.

open_interest_longs_usd.description: The sum of open interest of longs held within this pool in USD.

open_interest_shorts_usd.description: The sum of open interest in shorts held within this pool in USD.

tables.label: Trades
tables.description: Trade data, 1 entry for each close, open, or update of a trade.

transaction_hash.description: The hash of the transaction this trade was performed in.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

pool_address.description: The address of the pool this token was traded in.

amount.description: The value that a trader is putting to open a long or short, decimal normalized.

notional_value.description: The value of the leveraged amount of the trade, decimal normalized.

maker_pnl_usd.description: (Only applicable on trade close) The total profit and loss of the trade on the maker's side, in USD.

taker_pnl_usd.description: (Only applicable on trade close) The total profit and loss of the trade on the taker's side, in USD.

trade_action.description: The action of trade being recorded in this entry (ie, OPEN, CLOSE, INCREASE, DECREASE, LIQUIDATED).

trade_type.description: The type of the trade being recorded in this entry (ie, LONG, SHORT).
